heroDescription: Anaweza ni urubuga rw'akazi ruhuza abashakisha akazi bafite impano n'amahirwe meza y'umwuga. Erekana uburambe bwawe, uburezi, n'ubumenyi, cyangwa ubona umukandida ukwiriye ako kanya.
Bridging the gap between talented job se: Guhuza abashakisha akazi bafite impano n'amahirwe meza mu byiciro byose
Create your professional profile and get: Kora imyirondoro yawe y'umwuga kandi umenyekane ku bakoresha
Post opportunities and find the perfect: Tangaza amahirwe kandi ubone abakandida bakwiriye imyanya yawe
Create your professional profile, upload: Kora imyirondoro yawe y'umwuga, uzuza CV yawe, kandi uhurire n'abakoresha bashaka ubumenyi n'uburambe bwawe.
Post job opportunities, search for quali: Tangaza amahirwe y'akazi, shakisha abakandida babifitiye ubushobozi, kandi ushyireho ikipe yawe y'inzozi n'ibikoresho byacu bikomeye byo gutanga akazi.
Follow these simple steps to find your n: Kurikiza aya mabwiriza yoroshye kugira ngo ubone amahirwe yawe akurikira cyangwa umukandida mwiza
Build your professional profile highligh: Kora imyirondoro yawe y'umwuga yerekana ubumenyi bwawe, uburambe, n'intego z'umwuga. Igaragaze ku bakoresha bashoboka.
Search through our extensive database of: Shakisha muri databaze yacu y'akazi katandukanye mu byiciro n'ahantu hatandukanye.
Apply directly to jobs or get discovered: Saba akazi ku buryo buziguye cyangwa umenyekane ku bakoresha bashaka abakandida bafite ubumenyi bwawe.
Interview with potential employers and l: Koresha ikiganiro n'abakoresha bashoboka kandi ubone akazi k'inzozi binyuze kuri puratufomu yacu.
Hear from our community members who have: Umva abagize umuryango wacu babonye ibyiza binyuze kuri puratufomu yacu. Inkuru z'ukuri zivuye ku bantu b'ukuri.
Join thousands of professionals finding: Ifatanye n'ibihumbi by'abanyamwuga babona umwuga ubakwiriye buri munsi
Get the latest job opportunities and car: Bona amahirwe y'akazi aheruka n'inama z'umwuga zoherezwa mu gasanduku kawe k'imeri
By subscribing, you agree to our Privacy: Mu kwiyandikisha, wemeye Politiki y'Ibanga n'Amategeko y'Imikorere yacu
Anaweza is an innovative job-matching pl: Anaweza ni urubuga ruhuza abashakisha akazi n'abakoresha ku isi hose. Sisitemu yacu ituma abashakisha akazi bashobora gukora imyirondoro y'umwuga ibonwa n'abakoresha bashoboka, mu gihe abatanga akazi bashobora gutangaza amahirwe no gucunga abasaba akazi ku buryo bworoshye.
Our vision is to create a globally acces: Icyerekezo cyacu ni ugushyiraho urubuga ruboneka ku isi hose aho abashakisha akazi bashobora kwerekana ubumenyi bwabo n'abatanga akazi bashobora kubona abafite impano babakwiriye ku buryo bworoshye, bahujwe n'umwanya w'akazi ku isi hose.
We are committed to empowering job seeke: Twiyemeje guha abashakisha akazi ububasha bwo kugaragara no kubona amahirwe, mu gihe duha abatanga akazi ibikoresho bikora neza byo gutoranya impano nziza no gucunga neza abasaba akazi.
Access your account to discover job oppo: Injira mu konte yawe kugira ngo ubone amahirwe y'akazi yateganyijwe ku giti cyawe.
This platform helped me find my dream jo: Uru rubuga rwamfashije kubona akazi k'inzozi mu byumweru bike. Sisitemu ihuza abantu ku giti cyabo ni nshyashya!
Enter your credentials to access the sys: Shyiramo amakuru yawe kugira ngo ubone sisitemu
Enter your email and a new secure passwo: Shyiramo imeri yawe n'ijambo ryibanga rishya rifite umutekano
Secure your account with a new password: Rinda konte yawe n'ijambo ryibanga rishya kandi ukomeze kureba amahirwe y'akazi yateganyijwe ku giti cyawe.
The security features on this platform g: Ibiranga umutekano kuri uru rubuga bimpa amahoro mu bwenge. Nshobora kwibanda ku gushaka akazi nzi ko amakuru yanjye afite umutekano.
Complete your profile to start applying: Uzuza imyirondoro yawe kugira ngo utangire gusaba akazi
Enter your expected salary rage in frw (: Andika umushahara witeze mu mafaranga y'u Rwanda (urugero, 1000 cyangwa 1000 - 2000)
I accept the Terms and Conditions and Pr: Nemera Amabwiriza n'Amategeko hamwe na Politiki y'Ibiciro
Fill in your details to join Anaweza: Uzuza amakuru yawe kugira ngo wifatanye na Anaweza
Join our platform and discover job oppor: Ifatanye n'urubuga rwacu kandi ubone amahirwe y'akazi yateganyijwe ku giti cyawe.
Must be 10 digits starting with 078, 079: Ugomba kuba imibare 10 itangirana na 078, 079, 072, cyangwa 073
Welcome to Anaweza. These Terms and Con: Murakaza neza kuri Anaweza. Aya Mabwiriza n'Amategeko agenga ikoreshwa rya serivisi n'urubuga byacu. Ukoresheje Anaweza, wemeye kubahiriza aya Mabwiriza. Niba utemeranijwe n'igice icyo ari cyo cyose cy'aya mabwiriza, ntushobora gukoresha serivisi.
When you create an account with us, you: Iyo ushyiraho konti yawe, ugomba gutanga amakuru yuzuye, y'ukuri, kandi ashya. Gutubya ibyo bisaba bisa n'ikurikiranwa ry'Amategeko, bishobora gutuma konti yawe ishyirwaho ihita ihagarikwa.
You are responsible for safeguarding the: Uri umutangabusobanuzi wo kurinda ijambo ryibanga rikoreshwa mu kwinjira muri serivisi hamwe n'ibikorwa byose bikoreshwa n'ijambo ryawe ryibanga. Turagushishikariza gukoresha amagambo y'ibanga 'akomeye' (amagambo y'ibanga akoresha uruvange rw'inyuguti nini n'into, imibare, n'ibimenyetso) kuri konti yawe.
As an Anaweza user, you have the flexibi: Nk'umukoresha wa Anaweza, ufite ubushobozi bwo gushaka akazi no gutangaza amakuru y'akazi. Ubu bushobozi bwombi busaba igiciro cyo hejuru n'amategeko agenga ikoreshwa ryayo nk'uko bisobanurwa muri Politiki y'Ibiciro yacu.
Provide false, misleading, or inaccurate: Gutanga amakuru atari yo, ayobya, cyangwa atuzuye mu mwirondoro wawe cyangwa mu makuru y'akazi.
Use the service for any illegal purpose: Gukoresha serivisi mu gukorera ibintu binyuranyije n'amategeko cyangwa binyuranije n'amategeko y'ahantu, leta, igihugu, cyangwa mpuzamahanga.
Harass, abuse, or harm another person, i: Guhutaza, gukoresha nabi, cyangwa gukomeretsa undi muntu, harimo no kohereza ubutumwa budasanzwe ku bandi.
Post discriminatory job listings or enga: Gutangaza amakuru y'akazi avangura cyangwa kwinjira mu mikorere ivangura y'umukoresha.
Share or distribute private or personal: Gusangira cyangwa gukwirakwiza amakuru yihariye cyangwa y'amakuru y'abakoresha bandi utabanje kubabwira.
Create multiple accounts for deceptive o: Gushyiraho konti nyinshi ku mpamvu z'uburiganya cyangwa z'uburiganya.
Post irrelevant, misleading, or fraudule: Gutangaza amakuru y'akazi atari yo, ayobya, cyangwa y'uburiganya.
Attempt to access the accounts of other: Kugerageza kwinjira mu makuru y'abakoresha bandi cyangwa kwinjira mu mutekano w'urubuga.
Job seekers must provide accurate inform: Abashaka akazi bagomba gutanga amakuru yizewe ku bumenyi bwabo, uburambe, hamwe n'igiciro cy'umushahara bifuza. Igice cy'umushahara uhitamo kizagena igiciro cy'iyandikwa nk'uko tekiniki y'ibiciro yacu.
When applying for jobs through Anaweza,: Iyo usaba akazi binyuze kuri Anaweza, wemeye:
Apply only for positions for which you a: Gusaba gusa imyanya wifuza by'ukuri kandi ufitemo ibisabwa.
Provide truthful information in your app: Gutanga amakuru y'ukuri mu gusaba kwawe.
Adhere to the application limits associa: Kubahiriza imipaka y'ubusabe ijyanye n'icyiciro cya konti yawe.
Respect the confidentiality of any infor: Kubahiriza ibanga ry'amakuru yose atanzwe mu gihe cyo gusaba.
Job seeker accounts are subject to annua: Konti z'abashaka akazi zisabwa amafaranga yo kuvugurura buri mwaka nk'uko bisobanurwa muri Politiki y'Ibiciro yacu. Kunanirwa kuvugurura bishobora gutuma konti yawe igaragara bike cyangwa igafungwa.
All users, including those primarily reg: Abakoresha bose, harimo n'abiyandikishije nk'abashaka akazi, bashobora gutangaza amakuru y'akazi hakurikijwe amategeko akurikira:
All job postings must accurately represe: Amakuru yose y'akazi agomba kugaragaza neza umwanya utanzwe.
Job postings must include clear informat: Amakuru y'akazi agomba kugaragaza neza amakuru ku mirimo, inshingano, ubumenyi busabwa, n'ahantu.
Compensation details should be transpare: Ibisobanuro by'igihembo bigomba kuba bifite uruhushya kandi by'ukuri.
Job postings must comply with all applic: Amakuru y'akazi agomba kubahiriza amategeko yose y'umurimo n'akazi.
No discriminatory language or requiremen: Nta mvugo ivangura cyangwa ibisabwa byemewe mu makuru y'akazi.
Postings for illegal activities or servi: Guhagarika ibikorwa binyuranyije n'amategeko cyangwa serivisi birabujijwe cyane.
Job posting fees are charged according t: Amafaranga yo gutanga akazi ahabwa nk'uko byemejwe n'icyiciro cyahisemo kandi ntabwo ashobora gusubizwa nyuma y'amasaha 48 cyangwa nyuma yo kubona ubusabe.
Fees for user registration and job posti: Ibiciro by'iyandikwa ry'abakoresha n'amakuru y'akazi bisobanurwa muri Politiki y'Ibiciro yacu. Ibi biciro bishobora guhinduka igihe cyose hamaze gutangwa itangazo rikwiye ku rubuga rwacu.
You agree to pay all fees associated wit: Wemeye kwishyura amafaranga yose ajyanye n'icyiciro n'imirimo wahisemo. Amafaranga yose agomba kwishyurwa mbere kandi ntashobora gusubizwa keretse nk'uko bisobanurwa muri Politiki y'Iyishyurwa yacu.
We use trusted third-party payment proce: Dukoresha abacunga amafaranga b'abanyamwuga mu bikorwa byose. Utanze amakuru y'ubwishyu, uhagaririye ko wemerewe gukoresha uburyo bwo kwishyura kandi wemeye ko duha uburenganzira bwo kuguha uburyo bwo kwishyura wahisemo kubw'imirimo uhisemo.
The service and its original content, fe: Serivisi n'ibikubiyemo, ibiranga, n'imikorere byayo ni kandi bizakomeza kuba umutungo wihariye wa Anaweza n'abagenerwa uruhushya bayo. Serivisi irinzwe n'uburenganzira bw'umuhanzi, ikirango, n'andi mategeko yo mu Rwanda n'ay'ibindi bihugu.
You retain all rights to the content you: Ugumana uburenganzira bwose ku bikubiye utangaza kuri Anaweza. Utangaza ibikubiyemo, uduha uruhushya rutari rwihariye, ku isi yose, rudafite amafaranga yo gukoresha, kugaragaza, no gukwirakwiza ibikubiyemo byawe mu birebana no gutanga no guteza imbere serivisi.
We may terminate or suspend your account: Dushobora guhagarika konti yawe ako kanya, tutatanze itangazo cyangwa umwenda, kubera impamvu iyo ari yo yose, harimo, nta kugira imipaka, niba uvunitse Amategeko. Igihe cyo kurangira, uburenganzira bwawe bwo gukoresha serivisi buzahagarara vuba.
All provisions of the Terms which by the: Ibisabwa byose by'Amategeko aho kamere yabo igomba gukomeza nyuma yo kurangira bizakomeza kurangira, harimo, nta kugira imipaka, ibisabwa by'umutungo, kwanga indishyi, indishyi, n'imipaka y'umwenda.
Your use of Anaweza is also governed by: Ikoreshwa rya Anaweza rigenwa na Politiki y'Ibanga yacu, ishyirwa hano n'indango. Nyamuneka subiramo Politiki y'Ibanga yacu, igenga Serivisi kandi ikamenyesha abakoresha imikorere yacu yo gukusanya amakuru.
We reserve the right, at our sole discre: Twigumiye uburenganzira, ku bushishozi bwacu bwonyine, bwo guhindura cyangwa gusimbuza aya Mategeko igihe icyo ari cyo cyose. Tuzatanga itangazo ry'impinduka zose dutangaza Amategeko mashya kuri uru rupapuro.
Your continued use of the Service after: Gukomeza gukoresha Serivisi nyuma y'impinduka nk'izo bigaragaza ko wemeye Amategeko mashya. Niba utemeranijwe n'amwe muri aya mategeko cyangwa verisiyo y'Amategeko yose y'ubu, ntukoreshe cyangwa ntukoreshe serivisi.
If you have any questions about these Te: Niba ufite ibibazo ku Mategeko, nyamuneka tuvugishe kuri:
No job matches your search criteria. Try: Nta kazi gahuye n'ibipimo by'ishakisha ryawe. Gerageza ijambo ryibanze cyangwa akayunguruzo.
No active job seekers found at the momen: Aucun demandeur d'emploi actif trouvé pour le moment.
Meet some of our exceptional job seekers: Hura bamwe mubadushaka akazi badasanzwe biteguye kuzana ubumenyi bwabo mumuryango wawe. Buri mukandida yatoranijwe ku bushake muri pisine yacu.
Password must contain at least 8 charact: Ijambobanga rigomba kuba rifite byibuze inyuguti 8, harimo inyuguti nkuru, inyuguti nto, umubare, ninyuguti idasanzwe.
For any questions regarding our pricing,: Kubaza ibibazo bijyanye n'ibiciro byacu, nyamuneka hamagara itsinda ryacu rishinzwe ubufasha kuri support@anaweza.com.
We accept various payment methods includ: Twemera uburyo butandukanye bwo kwishyura burimo

Enter your expected salary range in RWF: Injiza urwego rw'umushahara witeze muri RWF (nko 1000 cyangwa 1000 - 2000)

For the complete Terms and Conditions, p: Kugira ngo usome Amategeko n’Amabwiriza yose, nyamuneka jya ku rupapuro rwacu rusobanura Amategeko n'Amabwiriza yose.
We may terminate your account without pr: Dushobora guhagarika konti yawe nta kuburira mbere mu gihe utubahirije Amategeko.

The service and its content remain the e: Serivisi n'ibiyikubiyemo biguma ari umutungo wa Anaweza. Ufite uburenganzira ku bikoresho ushyiraho, ariko uduha uruhushya rwo kubikoresha bijyanye na serivisi.
You agree to pay all fees associated wit: Wemera kwishyura amafaranga yose ajyanye n’icyiciro wahisemo. Kwishyura bigomba gukorwa mbere kandi ntibishobora gusubizwa keretse aho biteganyijwe muri Politiki y’Ubwishyu.

Salary range must be in format '1000' or: Urwego rw’umushahara rugomba kuba muri ubu buryo: '1000' cyangwa '1000 - 2000'

Only PDF, DOC, or DOCX files are allowed: Wemerewe gusa dosiye za PDF, DOC, cyangwa DOCX
Welcome to Anaweza. These Terms and Cond: Murakaza neza kuri Anaweza. Aya Mategeko n'Amabwiriza agenga imikoreshereze ya platform yacu na serivisi dutanga. Ukoresheje cyangwa winjiye muri Anaweza, wemera gukurikiza aya Mategeko.
When you create an account with us, you: Iyo ukoze konti kuri platform yacu, ugomba gutanga amakuru nyayo, arambuye, kandi avuguruye. Ushinzwe kurinda ijambo ry’ibanga ryawe no kwitwararika ibikorwa byose bikorerwa kuri konti yawe.
You agree not to provide false informati: Uwemera kutatanga amakuru y’ibinyoma, kudakoresha serivisi mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko, kudahohotera abandi, kudashyira amatangazo y’akazi arimo ivangura, no kudakora konti nyinshi ku mpamvu z’uburiganya.
You must provide accurate information ab: Ugomba gutanga amakuru nyayo yerekeye impamyabumenyi zawe, uburambe bwawe, n’igihe umushahara wifuza. Urwego rw’umushahara wifuza nirwo rugena amafaranga y’iyandikwa.
Are you sure you want to withdraw this a: Ese urashaka gukuraho iyi dosiye yawe?
Try adjusting your filters to see more r: Gerageza guhindura ibishakisho kugira ngo ubone ibisubizo byinshi.
